item.title: How do I make myself a donator? (317)
item.dc:creator: @toddyxx toddyxx
item.description:
@toddyxx wrote:

To make yourself donator go to your main source.
Then find a folder called Characters
Once found that look for your name on this server click edit.
Then scroll down till you find donator for eg it will be:
Donator= 0
change that to Donator= 1
Make sure you have the space between the = sign.
You must be logged off to do this then compile your client and restart it.
Then your changes will be made.
Hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make myself a donator? (317)
